amendment.description: Amendment adds the Office of Women's Health to the list of Federal agency representatives making up the interagency task force which will review, modify, and update best practices for pain management and prescribing pain medication.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 114-551 to add the Office of Women's Health.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brownley (CA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Brownley (CA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brownley (CA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
